summary: Refactored himalaya compose buffer mappings to use 2-letter maximum scheme. Added <leader>me (send), <leader>md (save draft), <leader>mq (quit/discard). Removed 3-letter <leader>mc* subgroup and conflicting conditional <leader>ms send mapping.

artifacts.summary: Added compose-specific help content and show_compose_help function
Updated keybinding documentation and help handler
Implementation summary for compose buffer mapping refactor

completion_data.completion_summary: Refactored himalaya compose buffer mappings to use 2-letter scheme (<leader>me for send, <leader>md for draft, <leader>mq for quit), removing 3-letter <leader>mc* subgroup and resolving <leader>ms conflict between sync inbox and send email.

next_steps: Test changes by opening Neovim and composing an email with :HimalayaWrite
